statistics.name: AllSkillsLearned
statistics.description: A '1' indicates that the player managed to learn all skills at least to level 1.

statistics.name: BasicComboLength
statistics.description: Combos result from successive use of one or more different combat moves. The combo is more impressive if many different combat moves are involved. BasicCombo is a combo with only ONE comat move repated many times ( The number of repetitions of this combat

statistics.name: CampaignCompleted_InEasyMode
statistics.description: Same as CampaignCompleted_InNormalMode but for easy mode.

statistics.name: CampaignCompleted_InHardMode
statistics.description: A '1' indicates that the user completed the campaign in hard difficulty mode.

statistics.name: CampaignCompleted_InInsaneMode
statistics.description: A '1' indicates that the user completed the campaign in insane difficulty mode.

statistics.name: CampaignCompleted_InNormalMode
statistics.description: A '1' indicates that the user completed the campaign in normal difficulty mode.

statistics.name: DefeatedHiddenKings
statistics.description:
The hidden kings are the 4 bosses located on the isles at the top-left,top-right,right and bottom-right of the main map. 
Each of the kings has a mythic weapon.
A value of 1 is submitted when the 4 kings have been defeated, otherwise nothing is submitted.

statistics.name: GodLikeComboLength

statistics.name: KingsDefeated_InEasyMode
statistics.description: Same as KingsDefeated_InNormalMode but for easy mode.

statistics.name: KingsDefeated_InHardMode
statistics.description: The number of kings the player has slain in hard difficulty mode of the game. There are 8 kings, each posessing an artifact needed to complete the game. ( The game does not end by slaying the 8th king ).

statistics.name: KingsDefeated_InInsaneMode
statistics.description: The number of kings the player has slain in insane difficulty mode of the game campaign. There are 8 kings, each posessing an artifact needed to complete the game. ( The game does not end by slaying the 8th king ).

statistics.name: KingsDefeated_InNormalMode
statistics.description: The number of kings the player has slain in normal difficulty mode of the game. There are 8 kings, each posessing an artifact needed to complete the game. ( The game does not end by slaying the 8th king ).

statistics.name: Learned_Attackjump_Level
statistics.description: Indicates the maximum level of the Attackjump combat move the player has learned during the game.

statistics.name: Learned_Charge_Level
statistics.description: Indicates the maximum level of the charge combat move the player has learned during the game.

statistics.name: Learned_Comet_Level
statistics.description: Indicates the maximum level of the Comet spell the player has learned during the game.

statistics.name: Learned_Fireball_Level
statistics.description: Indicates the maximum level of the Fireball spell the player has learned during the game.

statistics.name: Learned_Frenzy_Level
statistics.description: Indicates the maximum level of the Frenzy spell the player has learned during the game.

statistics.name: Learned_Gravity_Level

statistics.name: LevelReached_InEasyMode
statistics.description: Same as LevelReached_InNormalMode but for the easy mode.

statistics.name: LevelReached_InHardMode
statistics.description: The experience level the player reached in hard difficulty mode of the  game.

statistics.name: LevelReached_InInsaneMode
statistics.description: The experience level the player reached in normal difficulty mode of the  game.

statistics.name: LevelReached_InNormalMode
statistics.description: The experience level the player reached in normal difficulty mode of the  game.

statistics.name: MultiKill
statistics.description: The number of enemies the user has slain with one single attack. The more the better.

statistics.name: NumEnemiesSlayed
statistics.description: The total number of enemies the player slayed throughout the game.

statistics.name: SlayedDarwinModeKings_InEasyMode
statistics.description: Same as SlayedDarwinModeKings_InNormalMode but for easy mode.

statistics.name: SlayedDarwinModeKings_InHardMode
statistics.description: Number of kings(bosses) the player has slain in  hard difficulty mode in Darwin game mode. The Darwin game mode is a mode where you fight successive waves of kings until you die, the longer you survive the better.

statistics.name: SlayedDarwinModeKings_InInsaneMode
statistics.description: Number of kings(bosses) the player has slain in  insane difficulty mode in Darwin game mode. The Darwin game mode is a mode where you fight successive waves of kings until you die, the longer you survive the better.

statistics.name: SlayedDarwinModeKings_InNormalMode
statistics.description: Number of kings(bosses) the player has slain in  normal difficulty mode in Darwin game mode. The Darwin game mode is a mode where you fight successive waves of kings until you die, the longer you survive the better.
